show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: EcoMind: The Ecology of Democracy
content: A talk with Frances Moore Lappé about her newest book, EcoMind: Changing the Way We Think, to Create the World We Want,... <!--more--> which identifies 7 “thought traps” that keep us from taking effective action to solve collective problems, as well as 7 “thought leaps” that free us from constraining assumptions; campaign finance reform; also an update on fracking; also posting about ATN on FB; poem by Seamus Heaney
